/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The street is flanked by trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and urban architecture. The sky above is hazy, adding a sense of tranquility to the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the landscape.
